item.title: Bear raid: furry intruder swipes bird feeders while Carrie and Maine Coon look on
item.description: In a surprising wildlife encounter captured by @robins_birds on November 1, 2023, in Wilbraham, Massachusetts, USA, a daring black bear made an unexpected visit to a porch. The bear, undeterred, nonchalantly tore down bird feeders in broad daylight, with the resident's calico cat, Carrie, and a Maine Coon named Cashie observing from the safety of their home. The video, yet to be posted, showcases the boldness of the bear as it casually pilfers a suet feeder. The residents, including Carrie and Cashie, watched in awe as the unexpected guest indulged in some porch-side mischief, creating a moment of both excitement and amazement.

item.title: Canine conqueror: a fearless pooch ascends the temple of Kukulcan at Chichén Itzá
item.description: In a captivating video captured by @lorenamendoza703 on November 6, 2023, at Chichén Itzá in Yucatán, Mexico, a daring canine companion was spotted fearlessly ascending the ancient steps of the Temple of Kukulcan. This Mesoamerican step-pyramid, formally known as Chichen Itza Structure 5B18, stands at the heart of the archaeological site, dominating the landscape with its historical significance. Amidst the awe-inspiring backdrop of one of Mexico's most iconic landmarks, the adventurous dog boldly navigated the temple's steps, adding a charming and unexpected element to the ancient marvel's timeless allure.

item.title: Joyful serenade: parrot Semen takes the stage with a melodic stride in Kolkiv, Ukraine
item.description: In a heartwarming scene captured on June 2, 2023, in Kolkiv settlement, Volyn Oblast, Ukraine, by @14parrot90, a charming parrot named Semen stole the spotlight with his musical talents. The video showcases Semen perched on his owner's hands, serenading with a delightful melody before daringly leaping to the floor. item.title: Devastating El Nino floods disrupt education and displace 100k in Somalia
item.description: In a stark depiction of the devastating impact of El Nino on Somalia, a video posted by @caresom on November 8, 2023, reveals the widespread havoc wreaked by floods in the region. The footage, taken in Galckayo, Somalia, highlights the profound disruption to education across affected areas. Schools lie submerged, and essential learning materials have been destroyed, leaving countless students without access to education. The gravity of the situation is underscored by @caresom's urgent call for interventions to support the beleaguered communities. With more than 100,000 people displaced from their homes, the humanitarian crisis is dire. The video, filmed by a resident within the affected school, serves as a poignant reminder of the immediate need for assistance in Somalia.

item.title: Police clash with protesters opposing Catalan separatist negotiations in Madrid
item.description: Police clashed with protesters in Madrid's Martín de los Heros neighborhood, Spain on November 7th, 2023 as demonstrators voiced opposition to negotiations between Spain's acting government and Catalan separatist parties. The talks center on a possible amnesty for those involved in Catalonia's controversial independence movement. Video captured by Madrid resident @eduardojblasco shows police forcibly removing and detaining protesters who had gathered to denounce the negotiations.

item.title: Shepherd, Texas chemical plant explosion sparks massive fire, prompts evacuations
item.description: On the morning of November 8th, 2023, a catastrophic explosion rocked a chemical plant in Shepherd, Texas, USA. The incident, captured on video by @sparklingdonut, unleashed massive billows of black smoke, signaling a dangerous situation. The petroleum processing plant quickly became engulfed in flames, prompting emergency evacuations and stay-at-home orders in the surrounding areas. The aftermath left one employee with minor burns, highlighting the severity of the incident.

item.title: Protesters rally at Webb Dock, Melbourne, demanding a free Palestine
item.description: On November 8th, 2023, a passionate crowd gathered at Webb Dock in Melbourne, Australia, to vehemently express their support for a free Palestine amid the ongoing Israeli-Palestinian conflict. Captured by @socialist_davey, the video showcased hundreds of demonstrators, donned in solidarity with Palestinian flags, disrupting the normalcy of Zim's freight operations at the Port of Melbourne. Chanting the fervent slogan "Free, Free Palestine," the protesters made a powerful statement, demanding international attention and solidarity for the cause.

item.title: Protests surge in Madrid as controversial amnesty law sparks outcry against Catalan nationalists' pardon
item.description: In the heart of Ferraz, Madrid, Spain, a groundswell of dissent has erupted as protesters gather night after night, vehemently expressing their opposition to a contentious amnesty law negotiated by the Socialist Party and the Catalan Republican Left (ERC). The proposed legislation, arising from an agreement between the two political entities, aims to absolve Catalan nationalists involved in the 2017 secession attempt of legal charges. As captured in a video by @noemandalaya on November 7, 2023, at 9:30 pm, the streets echo with the fervor of those who adamantly reject what they see as a compromise compromising justice. The demonstrators, fueled by a sense of injustice, converge outside the Socialist Party headquarters, demanding a reconsideration of the amnesty law that could potentially benefit hundreds of Catalan nationalists.
item.slugline: Protests surge in Madrid as controversial amnesty law sparks outcry against Catalan nationalists' pardon

item.title: Chaos unleashed: terrifying storm strikes Santos, Brazil
item.description: In a chilling moment captured by @brendagabymuniz on November 3, 2023, Santos, São Paulo, Brazil, found itself at the mercy of a violent storm that wreaked havoc on the city. The video, taken from within a shopping mall, unveils the sheer force of the tempest, with winds so powerful that they nearly shattered the mall's doors. item.title: Amazon workers unite for decent pay and conditions in Coventry strike
item.description: On November 7, 2023, in Coventry, UK, a significant labor demonstration unfolded as over a thousand Amazon workers took to the streets in protest. Captured in a video by @GMBStuart, this event marked a crucial moment in their fight for improved pay and working conditions, especially as they entered the busiest season of the year. These workers, united under the banner of @GMB_union, showcased their determination to establish unionized workplaces where their rights and demands are respected. The strike action resonated with the growing momentum among Amazon employees, with ballots being held in other warehouses as more workers joined the cause. In addition to the strike, some Coventry workers engaged in conversations with their counterparts from Swindon, sharing strategies for mobilization and strike planning.

item.title: Tourists take a 'burning' plunge in Dagestan's 'Goryachka' spring
item.description: On September 13, 2023, in the village of Belidzhi, Dagestan, Russia, visitors from all over the country flocked to the renowned "Goryachka" hydrogen sulfide spring, which boasts a unique feature: the illusion of burning water. Despite its fiery appearance, the spring's water temperature does not exceed 40 degrees Celsius, ensuring bathers remain unharmed. Tourists ignited the streams of the source, creating a captivating illusion of "fiery" waters, in which they playfully immersed themselves, capturing the enchanting spectacle on their smartphones and cameras. The footage from this extraordinary location showcases the mesmerizing experience of "bathe in fire" as one of the tourists bathed in the burning water.

item.title: Terrifying moment: pedestrian bridge collapses into river during crossing
item.description: In a harrowing incident captured by @carlosgeovaninaje on November 2, 2023, in Chimalhuacán, Mexico, a pedestrian bridge collapsed into a river while people were crossing, resulting in a heart-stopping scene. As @carlosgeovaninaje recounted, he and others were returning from leaving flowers at his grandmother's resting place when they heard a sudden crash just meters away. Initially, they believed it might have been a car accident, but upon investigation, it became clear that it was the pedestrian bridge that had failed, causing panic and distress among those on it.

item.title: Dramatic windstorm in São Paulo: close call as dry wall falls near woman and child
item.description: In a harrowing incident captured on camera by @digooficiall on November 3, 2023, in Praia Grande, State of São Paulo, Brazil, a powerful windstorm accompanied by heavy rain unleashed chaos. The video shows how strong winds violently shook trees, creating a scene of imminent danger. Amidst the chaos, a woman and a child narrowly escaped a potentially life-threatening situation. They wanted to enter their car, parked just inside a mall, when the winds suddenly caused the mall's dry wall to collapse, missing them by a mere whisker.

item.title: Fire and explosions erupt in Sedovo, Ukraine due to short circuit in ammunition storage
item.description: On November 6, 2023, a fire and explosions occurred in the village of Sedovo, Ukraine, with no reported casualties. The head of the district administration, Vasily Ovcharov, attributed the incident to a short circuit. The fire initially broke out and then intensified, with efforts to extinguish it ongoing. Additionally, reports suggest that an explosion took place in a building housing ammunition, which ignited due to the same short circuit in the wiring. The village of Sedovo is situated approximately 10 kilometers from the border with Russia's Rostov region.

item.title: Cartagena's streets turn into rivers as locals playfully ride the floodwaters

It was a rare occurrence for the city, as such intense rainfall and street flooding had not been witnessed before.

item.title: Rescued dog Luigi bonds with foster Frenchie Patty through playtime
item.description: In a heartwarming video captured by @rhanna113 on October 10, 2023, in Trumbull, Connecticut, USA, the online community witnessed a touching moment between two remarkable dogs. Luigi, a five-year-old rescue dog, affectionately known as "Uncle Lu," showcased his gentle and caring nature as he played with Patty, a three-year-old French Bulldog. Patty, a recent addition to the household, was rescued from a puppy mill that had been shut down in Ohio just a few weeks prior. Luigi, who had his own history of neglect and abuse, offered his support to Patty, who was adjusting to her newfound freedom and healthier lifestyle.

item.title: Pro-Palestine protesters rally at Edinburgh Waverley train station
item.description: On November 4, 2023, a crowd of demonstrators gathered at Edinburgh Waverley train station in Edinburgh, Scotland, UK, to express their support for Palestine amidst the ongoing conflict between Palestine and Israel. The protesters, captured in a video by @AdamMcGibbon, passionately chanted "Free Palestine" while holding Palestinian flags, underscoring their solidarity with the Palestinian cause. This demonstration is part of a global wave of support for Palestine, with people from various regions expressing their concern and advocating for a peaceful resolution to the longstanding conflict.

item.title: Joyful impromptu fishing adventure with a plastic bucket in Samarinda, Indonesia
item.description: In a spontaneous and lighthearted video captured by @riosky01 on October 28, 2023, in Samarinda, Indonesia, some friends found a unique way to catch fish. Armed with a plastic bucket riddled with holes and a brush affixed to a handle, they gleefully showcased their impromptu fishing technique. In the footage, one friend held the bucket while the other skillfully guided the fish into it using the brush. Their infectious joy was evident as they celebrated their unexpected catch. As @riosky01 puts it, "my friend and I accidentally saw a fish and took the initiative to make a video to make it funny."

item.title: Chaos erupts in Buenos Aires as Chacarita football fans clash with police after controversial match
item.description: In a tumultuous scene captured by @yutackk on October 28, 2023, in the San Martin neighborhood of Buenos Aires, Argentina, chaos unfolded as Chacarita football fans clashed with the police following a controversial match. Chacarita, a team vying for promotion to the first division of Argentine soccer, had suffered from perceived injustices in officiating and league decisions. After the match concluded, tensions boiled over as fans left the stadium. Police formed a line to prevent potential demonstrations, but fireworks were hurled at them by passionate Chacarita supporters, creating a dangerous situation.

item.title: Close encounters with wild bears: driving the Transfăgărășan road in Romania
item.description: In a captivating video captured by @suvihavaja on October 15, 2023, while traveling along the renowned Transfăgărășan road in Romania, viewers are treated to an unexpected and thrilling spectacle. The footage showcases three imposing black bears confidently strolling along the road, casually navigating their way among the vehicles and tourists. Amidst this bear encounter, a lone fox stands sentinel at the roadside, adding to the enchanting wilderness of the moment. While these bears may appear tame, it's essential to remember that they are, in fact, wild animals, and feeding them is strongly discouraged. Romania, known for its rich bear population, is witnessing an increasing number of bear-human encounters, highlighting the importance of respecting these magnificent creatures from a safe distance. A total of five bears were spotted during this descent down the winding mountain road, emphasizing the unique and awe-inspiring wildlife encounters that can be experienced along the Transfăgărășan in Romania.
item.slugline: Close encounters with wild bears: driving the Transfăgărășan road in Romania

item.title: Cat bites lizard, dog tries to snatch, kid rescues: Quilpué, Chile video
item.description: In a recent video captured in Quilpué, Chile on October 31, 2023, user @nancyponceph documented a rather eventful encounter involving their cat and a lizard. The footage shows the feline initially biting into the lizard, but things take an unexpected turn as @nancyponceph attempts to intervene, causing the cat to momentarily drop its prey. As the cat prepares to resume its unconventional meal, a dog swoops in, eager to seize the lizard for itself. However, @nancyponceph steps in to prevent the dog from snatching the reptile. The drama concludes when a child from the family emerges and carefully retrieves the lizard, ultimately taking it outside to safety.

item.title: Powerful Iguazú Falls display nature's might amidst rising waters
item.description: In a striking video captured by @lilianpatriciaale on October 30, 2023, at Argentina's renowned Iguazú Falls, nature's grandeur is on full display as the falls surge with unparalleled force. The brown hue of the water, a result of increased turbidity caused by heavy rains and rising river levels, adds to the spectacle. While some parts of the international park had to be temporarily closed due to these adverse weather conditions, the video predominantly focuses on the awe-inspiring might of the falls as they rush through the park.

item.title: Fuel shortages cause chaos and long queues at Argentine gas stations
item.description: On October 28, 2023, in Formosa, Argentina, citizens faced a dire situation as fuel shortages gripped the nation. The scarcity of petrol and diesel, caused by domestic refining issues and delayed imports due to a lack of foreign currency, led to long queues and chaos at gas stations across the country. One video, captured by @rodry182hv, vividly illustrated the frustration, with a 45-minute wait at one of the few service stations that had gasoline.

item.description: In a heartwarming moment captured on video in Seattle, Washington, USA, on October 14, 2023, a woman approached a costumed motorbike rider, playfully known as @gowithfluffy, and asked if she could take a picture of him for her grandson. In a seemingly serious moment, he initially declined, but then, with a mischievous grin, he quickly reversed his decision and gave her the green light. The video, shared by @gowithfluffy with the caption "Picture for the grandson. Fluffy said no by mistake," showcases this delightful interaction. item.title: Brave residents rescue cat from perilous heights in Murino, Russia
item.description: In a heart-pounding rescue operation in Murino, Russia, on September 25, 2023, concerned residents of an apartment building came to the aid of a stranded cat perched perilously on the fourth or fifth floor window sill. Eyewitnesses captured the dramatic event on video as neighbors stretched out blankets and rugs on multiple levels of the building to create a safety net. The cat, clinging for dear life, tried to grasp a blanket fluttering in the wind, but ultimately lost its grip and fell. Miraculously, quick-thinking residents, armed with blankets, managed to break the fall, saving the cat's life.

item.title: Lucien Charlon sets new world record in Dods Diving: 36.5 meters of adrenaline
item.description: On October 7, 2023, in Geneva, Switzerland, Lucien Charlon made history by setting a new world record in Dods Diving. He fearlessly leaped from a staggering height of 36.5 meters into the waters below. For Charlon, cliff jumping is more than just an adrenaline rush; it's an adventure shared with friends, a test of personal limits, and a pursuit of progress. His remarkable achievement on that unforgettable day is a testament to his dedication and the joy of pushing boundaries together with friends.

item.title: Full moon's radiant reflection on Burrow Beach
item.description: On the tranquil evening of October 29, 2023, at Burrow Beach in Sutton, Dublin, Ireland, a stunning spectacle unfolded as the full moon graced the night sky. A video captured by @SnowbieWx revealed the mesmerizing scene of the moon's radiant glow reflecting upon the tranquil lake surface. This natural phenomenon created a breathtaking and serene ambiance, drawing observers into the enchanting beauty of the lunar reflection on the calm waters of the lake.

item.title: Police rescue desperate girl from rooftop suicide attempt in Balkhash, Kazakhstan
item.description: In a harrowing incident in Balkhash, Kazakhstan, a young girl's life was saved by the prompt intervention of the local police. On the evening of September 23, 2023, at around 18:00, authorities received a distress call reporting that a girl was attempting to jump from the rooftop of a five-story building. Swift action by the police prevented the tragic outcome, and the rescued girl was immediately provided with much-needed psychological support. It was later revealed that the girl had been grappling with personal problems and had contemplated taking her own life.

item.title: Madrid rallies in solidarity with Palestine amidst Gaza-Israel conflict
item.description: In Madrid, Spain, on October 29, 2023, a significant demonstration took place as people marched in support of Palestine amidst the ongoing Gaza-Israel conflict. The video footage, captured by @marinalcuadrado, shows a passionate crowd waving Palestinian flags and chanting slogans in solidarity with the Palestinian people. The protesters expressed their deep concern over the ongoing conflict and the loss of lives in Gaza. @marinalcuadrado emphasized the urgency of the situation, citing a staggering figure of 8,500 casualties in just two weeks, and called for an end to what they described as a genocide, while condemning the alleged complicity of Western nations in the ongoing crisis.

item.title: Rescue cat's reluctant vet visit: a carrier conundrum
item.description: In a humorous video captured by @kiara_burns_ on October 5, 2022, in Los Angeles, California, USA, the struggle of pet owners attempting to get their feline companions into carriers for vet visits is on full display. Kiara's cat, Hazel, a 5-year-old rescue, had no intentions of making the trip to the vet for a dental cleaning an easy one. As the video reveals, the determined Hazel resisted the carrier, leaving her owner to grapple with the challenge. @kiara_burns_ shared the clip with a chuckle, explaining that she had initially recorded it to demonstrate to her boyfriend just how stubborn Hazel could be when it came to getting into the carrier.

item.title: Thrilling mid-air ziplining dive into Slovenian waters
item.description: In a heart-pounding video captured on October 22, 2023, in Slovenia, two daring individuals were seen embarking on an adrenaline-pumping ziplining adventure. item.title: Ukrainian soldier takes shelter under mulberry tree during shelling
item.description: On June 30, 2023, in the Orikhiv district of Ukraine, a Ukrainian soldier, identified as @z_o_r_y_a_18, captured a video that vividly portrays the harrowing reality of the conflict in the region. While under a mulberry tree, she can be seen eating berries as the sound of shelling fills the background. Her words convey the urgency of the situation, explaining, "We came under fire, waited out the fire in a ditch under a mulberry tree, because that's how you can hide so that Orlan doesn't see."

item.title: Powerful Iguazú Falls roar to life as river swells
item.description: Iguazú Falls, located in Brazil, has come to life with a breathtaking display of nature's power. A video captured by @lilianpatriciaale on October 30, 2023, showcases the falls in all their glory as the water flows with immense force. The once crystal-clear waters now appear brown due to turbidity, a testament to the sheer volume and vigor of the flow. This phenomenon is a result of heavy rains and a rapidly rising river, which have led to the closure of some parts of the international park.

item.title: Devastation unleashed: hurricane Otis wreaks havoc in Acapulco
item.description: Hurricane Otis struck the coastal town of Acapulco, Guerrero, Mexico, leaving a trail of destruction in its wake. In a video captured by @jorgechantres on October 26, 2023, the sheer force of the storm's strong winds and relentless rain is evident. After the hurricane had passed, the aftermath revealed a landscape of chaos and ruin. Houses, including @jorgechantres' residence in Torre Java, lay in disarray, with ceilings collapsed and shattered window panes. Debris littered the streets, creating hazardous conditions, and some cars were overturned. Hurricane Otis proved to be a merciless force of nature, inflicting significant damage on this coastal community.

item.title: Deadly floods strike Libya: over 25,000 lives lost in devastation
item.description: On September 18, 2023, Libya was struck by the devastating force of Storm Daniel, resulting in catastrophic floods that claimed the lives of over 25,000 people. The storm brought about intense winds and sudden heavy rainfall, which led to the collapse of two dams and subsequent widespread flooding across north-eastern Libya, affecting towns such as Derna, Benghazi, Tobruk, Almari, and Sousa. The aftermath of this natural disaster left homes, hospitals, roads, and power lines in ruins, with entire city streets being submerged by the surging waters. Volunteer @qy_zp, who serves with the Libyan Red Crescent, captured a grim scene of destruction in Derna and reported the urgent efforts to recover bodies near the port, highlighting the harrowing consequences of this tragic event.
item.slugline: Deadly floods strike Libya: over 25,000 lives lost in devastation

item.title: Protesters in Dagestan clash with authorities over flight from Tel Aviv, prompting airport closure
item.description: On October 29, 2023, in Makhachkala, Dagestan, Russia, a group of protesters confronted authorities at the local airport as they attempted to meet a flight arriving from Tel Aviv. The demonstrators, some carrying Palestinian flags, broke through the airport building, and a portion of them managed to reach the runway. In response, the Federal Air Transport Agency temporarily closed the airport for incoming and outgoing flights. The situation was swiftly addressed by law enforcement, with the Investigative Committee of Dagestan launching a case on charges of mass riots. Officials from the regional Ministry of Internal Affairs also pledged to identify all participants involved in the disturbance. Amid the turmoil, local social activists called on residents to remain calm and not give in to external provocations.
item.slugline: Protesters in Dagestan clash with authorities over flight from Tel Aviv, prompting airport closure

item.title: Water hole chair challenge ends with a splash!
item.description: In a recent video captured by @fahrilakbarrr_ on October 18, 2023, in Aceh, Pidie, Indonesia, two young men took on a challenge that left them with wet clothes and plenty of laughter. item.title: Destructive Zonda winds strike Mendoza, Argentina: captured on video
item.description: On October 28, 2023, in Mendoza, Argentina, @sthefi.guajardo recorded a striking video depicting the sheer force of the infamous "zonda" wind. Characterized by its intensity, aridity, and scorching temperatures, the zonda wind is a meteorological phenomenon that materializes under specific climatic conditions in regions adjacent to the Andes Mountains. In the footage, a tree succumbs to the unrelenting gales, collapsing onto the road, vividly illustrating the destructive potential of this natural occurrence. The zonda wind, a regional name for the foehn wind, is known to wreak havoc, including fires and various other natural disasters, particularly on the eastern slopes of the Andes in Argentina.

item.title: Young Amazonian overcomes river drought challenge with skill and determination
item.description: In a video captured by @rafaelapinhei on October 21, 2023, in Manaquiri, Amazonas, Brazil, a young man was seen grappling with the challenges of navigating a small boat on a riverbed that had considerably dried up. As the region experiences an annual ebb, causing rivers to recede, local families must adapt to the ensuing difficulties. The video showcased the young boy's momentary setback due to the lack of water, as he made an erroneous route choice. However, it also highlighted his resilience and resourcefulness as he skillfully maneuvered his boat through the mud.

item.title: Thrilling first ride: conquering 'the maximum' descent in Lima, Peru
item.description: On September 7, 2023, in the coastal city of Lima, Peru, an exhilarating adventure unfolded as an intrepid cyclist, @csantiagozl, embarked on their first-ever ride down the heart-pounding descent known as "The Maximum." This rugged and treacherous trail proved to be a true test of skill and nerve, with its super-steep gradients and slippery terrain. During the daring descent, one of the riders ahead of the author briefly lost balance but quickly recovered, showcasing unwavering determination. The video captures @csantiagozl's fearless journey down the trail, pushing the boundaries of their cycling abilities as they neared the trail's end.

item.title: Playful Weimaraner and Labrador have a tail-wagging encounter with mink Mishka
item.description: In a heartwarming video captured in Kyiv, Ukraine by @barabash1346 on October 12, 2023, two dogs, a Weimaraner named Sonya and a Labrador named Fighter, shared an endearing encounter with their furry friend, a mink named Mishka. The video depicts the mink playfully engaging with one of the dogs' tails, prompting a gentle scolding. However, the dog quickly reciprocated, engaging in playful antics with the curious mink. According to @barabash1346, Mishka has been a part of their household for six months and is known for her love of meat, enjoying a refreshing bath, and her playful biting habits.

item.title: Video captures distracted cyclist's collision with traffic barrier on Sichuan highway
item.description: In an incident captured on video by @shanxifenhongtradingco.,ltd in Sichuan province, China, on October 15, 2023, a motorbike rider collided with a traffic barrier on a highway. The author of the video was driving along the road when a man riding an electric bicycle appeared on the right. Despite a roadblock ahead, the cyclist failed to change direction and crashed directly into the traffic barrier. Upon closer examination, it became evident that the rider was using his phone while cycling, ultimately leading to the accident. Fortunately, the collision resulted in only minor injuries, with the cyclist reportedly suffering minor bruises.

item.title: Mass riots erupt at Makhachkala airport due to a plane from Tel Aviv
item.description: On October 29, 2023, in Makhachkala, Dagestan, Russia, a mass riot unfolded at the city's airport, leading to the opening of a criminal case under Article 212 of the Russian Federation's Criminal Code. The rioters, numbering in the hundreds, stormed into the airport, including the runway, following the arrival of an international flight from Tel Aviv, Israel. Reports indicated that they were chanting antisemitic slogans and seeking passengers from the Israeli flight. In response to the chaos, the airport was closed, and incoming planes were diverted to alternate airfields. Videos of the incident showed a tumultuous scene with police sirens blaring. The Dagestani government, while expressing support for Palestinians in Gaza amid the ongoing Israel-Gaza conflict, urged citizens to remain calm and refrain from participating in such protests.
item.slugline: Mass riots erupt at Makhachkala airport due to a plane from Tel Aviv

item.title: Terrifying storm swings construction worker into skyscraper
item.description: In a dramatic video captured by @_tomlewis on October 26, 2023, in Dubai Marina, UAE, a construction worker faced a harrowing ordeal when a sudden storm with strong winds hit the area. The worker was perched on a suspended movable platform, several stories above the ground, working on a high-rise building. As the winds intensified, the platform swung precariously, causing a collision with the skyscraper. The impact shattered the glass exterior of the skyscraper, sending shards plummeting downward. The heart-stopping incident repeated itself as the storm raged on. The current status of the worker's safety remains unknown.

item.title: Cat's sneaky hide-and-seek game under motorbike wheel
item.description: In an unexpected turn of events in Pekanbaru, Indonesia, a vigilant cat decided to play an impromptu game of hide-and-seek with a motorbike owner. As captured by @gataudisinigelap on August 21, 2023, the feline's mischievous antics left the motorbike owner baffled. When the owner parked their bike near a meatball place, they noticed the cat loitering nearby. However, when it was time to leave, the cat had mysteriously taken refuge inside the motorbike. After disassembling part of the bike's body to free the cat, the owner assumed it had fled. But upon returning home, they heard meowing emanating from their motorbike. To their surprise, the crafty cat had managed to find a cozy spot inside the bike's front wheel well. The cat was released and is fine.

item.title: Hurricane Otis ravages Acapulco: hotel devastated by category 5 storm
item.description: On October 24, 2023, Acapulco, Mexico, bore the destructive brunt of Hurricane Otis, a powerful category five storm with wind speeds reaching a staggering 270 km/h (165 mph). Photographer @davidvaz73 captured a grim aftermath in a video, focusing on a hotel that had suffered severe damage. The footage revealed a pool filled with debris and murky water, alongside a building with extensive structural harm. Guardrails were torn off in various sections, and debris littered the corridors. Hurricane Otis, which had already claimed at least 27 lives, also left a trail of devastation, shattering windows, uprooting trees, and severely disrupting communication and transportation links in the region. High-rise towers bore gaping holes in their walls, and vehicles were overturned by the furious storm.

item.title: Hurricane Otis ravages Acapulco, leaving devastation in its wake
item.description: On October 24, 2023, the picturesque coastal city of Acapulco, Mexico, bore witness to the destructive power of Hurricane Otis. With winds reaching an astonishing 270 kilometers (165 miles) per hour, this Category 5 hurricane unleashed its fury upon the city, causing widespread devastation. The aftermath, as captured by @davidvaz73, revealed a scene of chaos and destruction, with debris from trees and houses scattered across the streets. One multi-story building stood as a stark reminder of the hurricane's might, with parts of its walls torn asunder. Regrettably, Hurricane Otis claimed at least 27 lives and disrupted communication and transportation links throughout the region. It left Acapulco's skyline marred, high-rise towers bearing gaping holes in their walls and vehicles overturned. @davidvaz73, who had been in Acapulco with plans for a show that was ultimately canceled due to the storm, described the hurricane as a harrowing surprise during his stay in a local hotel.
item.slugline: Hurricane Otis ravages Acapulco, leaving devastation in its wake

item.title: Hurricane Otis devastates Acapulco: category 5 landfall record breaker
item.description: Hurricane Otis made a catastrophic landfall in Acapulco, Guerrero, Mexico, on October 25, 2023, with winds reaching Category 5 intensity, as documented by @MrRogelioG in a video. This compact but powerful tropical cyclone resulted in the tragic loss of 27 lives. Otis became the first Pacific hurricane to make landfall as a Category 5, surpassing the previous record held by Hurricane Patricia. The hurricane's destructive force led to widespread devastation, including building destruction and severe flooding in the region.

item.title: Russian rocket strikes Nova Poshta depot in Kharkiv
item.description: On October 21, 2023, tragedy struck in Kharkiv, Ukraine, as a Russian missile targeted a Nova Poshta delivery company depot. The devastating attack resulted in the loss of six lives and left 17 employees of Nova Poshta wounded. The workers had no chance to seek shelter, as the air-raid warning was issued just a second before the missile's explosion. Early reports suggest that the attack was carried out with two S-300 missiles launched from Russia's Belgorod Oblast. This incident adds to the ongoing tension in the Ukraine-Russia conflict. @novaposhta.official captured the heartbreaking moment on their surveillance cameras.
item.slugline: Russian rocket strikes Nova Poshta depot in Kharkiv

item.title: Feisty duck interrupts deer feast in Zakharivka Village, Ukraine
item.description: In a captivating moment captured by @vitalikkulenko on October 14, 2023, in Zakharivka village, Ukraine, a video revealed an unexpected twist during what seemed like a peaceful feeding time. Deers peacefully grazed from a food trough until a determined duck made a sudden entrance, causing the startled deers to scatter in surprise. However, it wasn't long before @vitalikkulenko's kind gesture of offering a slice of apple lured the timid creatures back to the trough. The videographer then intervened, gently ushering the curious duck away, allowing the deer to enjoy their meal in peace.

item.title: Devastating flooding in Al Mahrah, Yemen: hurricane Tej splits road and swallows cars
item.description: On October 24, 2023, Al Mahrah Governorate in Yemen bore the brunt of Hurricane Tej's fury as torrential rain and heavy showers inundated the region. A striking video captured by @IYafieiu shows a tarmac road split in two, with two cars submerged in the chasm created by the flooding. Hurricane Tej's eye made landfall along the eastern Yemeni coast, devastating communities in its path. Socotra and Al Maharah experienced record-breaking rainfalls, resulting in multiple road blockages across the area.

item.title: First-time pool paw-splashing with Talaz and Taiga in Saint-Étienne, France
item.description: In a heartwarming video captured by @purekangal on September 7, 2023, in Saint-Étienne, France, two curious dogs, Talaz and Taiga, embarked on their inaugural swimming pool adventure. The video showcased a lady in the pool strategically placing a ball between the two hesitant canines. At first, the dogs displayed some reluctance, tentatively dipping their front paws into the water, but they didn't progress further. However, in a touching turn of events, one of the dogs mustered the courage to retrieve the ball before promptly exiting the pool. @purekangal, their proud owner, shared, "My dogs, Talaz and Taiga, have never been in a swimming pool; this is literally the first time they've entered one. So, this is a whole ceremony, how me and my girlfriend have got them to finally do it."

item.title: Firefighter rescues hedgehog from Kherson region blaze set by arsonists
item.description: In a video captured on September 12, 2023, in the Kherson region of Ukraine, a local firefighter known as @firefighter_ks can be seen carrying a hedgehog to safety in their hands, wrapped in a cloth. The heroic act was prompted by a devastating fire that had been intentionally set in the area. The video not only showcases the firefighter's compassionate response but also reveals some of the region's landscapes engulfed in flames. @firefighter_ks explained the situation, stating, "Some people set the grass on fire, and there are a lot of such animals. This is how the hedgehog was saved."

item.title: Brave 9-year-old girl fends off stray dogs to protect her pup
item.description: In Voronezh, Russia, on September 3, 2023, a remarkable display of bravery was captured surveillance camera. Nine-year-old Varvara, while walking her leashed dog in the neighborhood driveway, faced a sudden and terrifying encounter with two large stray dogs. In a swift and courageous act, Varvara lifted her small dog to safety, but one of the strays managed to bite her clothing, causing her to trip and fall. However, the determined young girl quickly regained her footing while still clutching her dog's leash. The two stray dogs retreated, and concerned neighbors rushed to ensure her well-being.

item.title: Landmark moment: Moscow Zoo welcomes first giant panda cub in Russian history
item.description: On August 24, 2023, a historic moment occurred at the Moscow Zoo as the first giant panda cub in Russian history was born. This remarkable event, part of an international program dedicated to the conservation, protection, and research of giant pandas, marked a significant milestone for both Russia and the global environmental community. Weighing approximately 150 grams, the gender of the cub remains unknown, but the young mother, Dingding, has shown remarkable care and acceptance of her offspring. In an extraordinary achievement, this cub was conceived naturally, a rare occurrence in panda breeding, and it was made possible with the guidance of Chinese experts. The success of this endeavor is further underscored by the fact that the parents, Ruyi and Dingding, are relatively young, at seven and six years old, respectively, whereas giant pandas typically give birth when they are 8-10 years old.

item.title: Hurricane Norma strikes La Paz, Mexico: rain, wind, and thunder
item.description: On October 21, 2023, La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico, found itself in the midst of a powerful weather event as Hurricane Norma made landfall. A video captured by @ggsoriano03 showcased the intensity of the storm, with heavy rainfall, fierce winds, and thunderous sounds shaking trees in the area. Once a Category 4 hurricane, Norma had weakened to a tropical storm with sustained winds of 70 mph (110 kph) upon reaching La Paz. Residents hunkered down in the safety of their homes, bracing for the impact of this formidable storm.

item.title: Washington D.C. rally: protest for Palestine
item.description: On October 21, 2023, in Washington, D.C., a powerful protest captured by @elfaddis brought the ongoing conflict between Gaza and Israel to the forefront. The video shows a passionate crowd chanting, "Biden, Biden you can't hide. We charge you with genocide," in support of Palestine. The protesters raised Palestinian flags as a symbol of solidarity, highlighting the contentious issue of U.S. support for Israel in the face of the conflict even when Israel blockaded Gaza, which has severely affected the region's essential needs.

item.title: Ingenious moth control: man uses smartphone light to redirect moths towards street light
item.description: In a clever and effective method for tackling a moth problem in Karawang, Indonesia, a video captured by @ruharu_01 on October 16, 2023, showcases a man's ingenious approach. With his smartphone's torch function, the man approached an outdoor light that had been attracting moths, then switched off the light, leaving the moths only with the illumination from his mobile device. Slowly backing away towards a nearby streetlight, the moths followed the smartphone light until they encountered the brighter streetlight, leading them to divert their flight path. This simple yet innovative solution successfully eliminated the moth issue.
item.slugline: Ingenious moth control: man uses smartphone light to redirect moths towards street light

item.title: Short circuit fire erupts in Anapa School, swiftly extinguished by teacher
item.description: On October 12, 2023, a short circuit sparked a fire in a classroom at School No. 2 in Anapa, Krasnodar Territory, Russia. Fortunately, the quick response of the teacher and students prevented any casualties, as they swiftly evacuated the classroom. Eyewitness footage showed an extension cord near a school board catching fire. Before the arrival of rescuers, the teacher successfully extinguished the fire, and the school resumed its normal operations. The supervisory activities department is currently investigating the incident to determine its cause and implement any necessary preventive measures.

item.title: Close call: young boy's dash for dropped phone narrowly avoids tragedy
item.description: In a heart-stopping moment captured on video by Elena Fedorova on September 28, 2023, on Bolshevikov Avenue in St. Petersburg, Russia, a young boy narrowly escaped a potentially tragic accident. While driving at a slow speed of 5 km/h, the boy accidentally dropped his smartphone in front of the approaching car. Displaying quick reflexes, he dashed in front of the vehicle to retrieve his phone just in the nick of time. Thankfully, the driver, Elena Fedorova, was able to come to a halt before tragedy struck. Elena's message to parents is clear: "Parents, explain to your children that they need to think with their heads before throwing themselves under the wheels of a car after a mobile phone that has flown out of their hands."
item.slugline: Close call: young boy's dash for dropped phone narrowly avoids tragedy

item.title: Ukrainian soldiers share a laugh amidst Russian firefight
item.description: In a gripping video captured by @andreynikonorov8 on August 2, 2023, in Klishchiivka, Donetsk Oblast, Ukraine, Ukrainian soldiers found themselves in a harrowing situation as they came under fire from Russian soldiers. Amid the chaos and danger, one soldier sought refuge in a dark corner, and when he emerged, the group broke into laughter. The video offers a stark glimpse into the resilience of Ukrainian soldiers in the ongoing conflict, as @andreynikonorov8 succinctly noted, "Russian soldiers were firing at us. But you know, we are so used to it that the only emotion is to laugh. Well, so are we."

item.description: On October 15, 2023, in the midst of escalating conflict between Gaza and Israel, an Israel news channel reporter, @leeayash, captured a dramatic video from her Tel Aviv balcony. The footage shows the Israeli Iron Dome, a mobile all-weather air defense system, in action, intercepting and neutralizing missiles launched by the Hama group with the intent of striking Tel Aviv.
item.slugline: Iron dome intercept: Israel defends Tel Aviv against Hamas missile attacks

item.title: Unexpected mishap: man trips over dog bowl and takes a tumble
item.description: On October 6, 2023, in Irati, State of Paraná, Brazil, a moment of unexpected misfortune was captured on video by @jeftalvez. While entering a house, @jeftalvez stumbled over a dog's water bowl that had been placed in his path. His initial reaction was to kick it in frustration, but in a twist of fate, he lost his balance as he tried to kick it and ended up taking an unintentional tumble. In his own words, "I was working, and someone put water out for the dogs, and I didn't see the pot of water."
item.slugline: Unexpected mishap: man trips over dog bowl and takes a tumble

item.title: Unique half-cut car conversion: a low rider like no other
item.description: In an intriguing automotive spectacle captured in Mendoza, Argentina on October 5, 2023, a car aficionado from Chile, known as @felipe_cepedav, documented a remarkable vehicle modification. The video showcased a car cleverly sliced in half and ingeniously transformed into an unconventional low rider. Beneath the custom-engineered exterior lay a go-kart chassis, car wheels, and a motorcycle engine. The driver, remarkably, assumed a reclined position within the vehicle, defying conventional norms in the world of automobile customization.

item.title: Mountain climber's terrifying fall at Mt. Mizugaki, Japan
item.description: In a gripping video captured by @kanta_3128 on August 28, 2023, at Mt. Mizugaki, Japan, a climber's heart-stopping descent took a dramatic turn. The footage reveals a climber descending the mountain using a rope when he suddenly slipped and struck his back against a rock, flipping face-down. Groaning in pain, the climber's fate seemed grim. However, a tense moment later, after a conversation with the individual holding the rope, he miraculously flipped back face-up to assess his condition.

item.title: Narrow escape: family evacuates as wildfire threatens home in Villa Carlos Paz, Argentina
item.description: In a harrowing incident on October 10, 2023, @Carolaromero021 and her family in Villa Carlos Paz, Córdoba Province, Argentina, were forced to evacuate their home as a relentless wildfire closed in on their property. Their desperate escape, captured in a chilling video by their nephew, showed flames approaching their house. Struggling to breathe, they made the decision to flee a few blocks away in their vehicles. The situation took a dire turn as Carol's brother-in-law fell seriously ill and required hospitalization. However, fate intervened when the wind direction shifted, sparing their home as the flames ravaged the pool area instead.
item.slugline: Narrow escape: family evacuates as wildfire threatens home in Villa Carlos Paz, Argentina

item.title: Post-storm Babet: calm returns to Torcross seafront
item.description: @StartBayInn, located in Torcross, Devon, UK, captured a reassuring video on October 18, 2023, following the passage of Storm Babet. As the second named storm of the season, Babet had caused concerns as it developed west of the Iberian Peninsula before heading north and impacting Britain. In the video, the waves, although still beating against the seafront, exhibited notably less intensity. The video, taken by one of the pub's owners, Gail, portrayed the relief of finding the pub dry inside and the road open after Gail's morning check following high tide.
item.slugline: Post-storm Babet: calm returns to Torcross seafront

item.title: Adorable monkey sibling rivalry over milk
item.description: In a heartwarming scene captured on September 12, 2023, in Hai Phong, Vietnam two baby monkeys were spotted sound asleep, cuddling each other. The tender moment took an amusing twist when the author introduced a milk bottle to the sleepy duo. Instantly, the little monkeys awoke and eagerly reached for the bottle, setting off a playful tug-of-war. One monkey managed to secure the prized nipple for a sip, but the other quickly descended to claim the milk for itself. This endearing display of sibling rivalry over the bottle reminds us that even in the animal kingdom, sharing isn't always easy, but it sure makes for an adorable spectacle.

item.title: Storm Babet strikes Cornwall with 80mph gale force winds: amber warning issued
item.description: On October 17, 2023, Storm Babet unleashed its fury on the coastal town of Mousehole in Cornwall, UK, with relentless 80mph gale force winds and torrential rain. As captured in a video by @JaneJohnsonBakr, the seafront bore the brunt of this powerful storm, as waves crashed against the shoreline. The Met Office issued an amber warning for the region, urging residents to take precautionary measures. With the area in the storm's grip, locals like @JaneJohnsonBakr were "battening down the hatches" to weather the wild conditions.

item.title: Football fans unite in solidarity for shooting victims during Belgium-Sweden Euro qualifier
item.description: In a powerful display of unity, thousands of football fans at King Baudoin Stadium in Brussels, Belgium, showed their unwavering support for the victims of a tragic shooting that occurred just miles away. The Euro qualifier match between Belgium and Sweden came to an abrupt halt at halftime when a gunman fatally shot two Swedish individuals before kickoff. With the suspect still at large and reportedly targeting Swedes, Belgian authorities kept over 35,000 fans inside the stadium for their safety, eventually initiating an evacuation around midnight local time. Captured by @LydieBastin on October 16, 2023, a heartwarming video emerged, illustrating the fans' resilience and solidarity as they chanted slogans in memory of the victims.
item.slugline: Football fans unite in solidarity for shooting victims during Belgium-Sweden Euro qualifier

item.title: Rescue in the rain: Tatyana saves stranded kitten Sheikh on a highway
item.description: On July 27, 2023, a rainy day in Dzerzhinsk, Minsk region, Belarus, a heartwarming video captured by Tatiana shows the remarkable rescue of a stranded kitten. The helpless feline was found shivering by the side of a busy highway as passing cars splashed water on it. With compassion and quick thinking, Tatiana came to the rescue, scooping up the trembling cat and placing it safely inside her car. She lovingly cared for the kitten, and it's now thriving, happily named Sheikh, with the occasional saffron milk cap-inspired nickname.

item.title: Disturbing discovery: parasites found in raw meat while grilling in Burzaco, Argentina
item.description: In a shocking incident in Burzaco, Buenos Aires, Argentina, a video captured by @goddiieeph on October 6, 2023, has revealed a disturbing discovery. While preparing to grill some meat with friends, they stumbled upon a grim surprise when they noticed something unusual in the raw meat on the grill. Upon closer inspection, it became evident that the meat was infested with parasites and worms. Acting swiftly, they removed the contaminated meat from the grill and recorded the unsettling sight of parasites emerging from it. Fortunately, they identified the issue before cooking the meat, resulting in the decision to discard it entirely.

item.title: Independence day commemoration: wheelbarrow challenge ends in watery mishap
item.description: On August 17, 2023, in Rumpin, Bogor District, Indonesia, a unique and daring celebration of Indonesian Independence Day took an unexpected turn. A video captured by @vitapanggabean showcased participants using a wheelbarrow to navigate a thin wooden plank over water. The challenge involved one person pushing the wheelbarrow, while another person sat inside. However, as they attempted to cross the makeshift bridge, the participant pushing the wheelbarrow lost their balance, resulting in a humorous mishap as both of the participants took an unexpected plunge into the water.
